1:
Text: Charlie Brown's All Stars!:  is the second prime-time animated TV special based upon the popular comic strip "Peanuts," by Charles M. Schulz.

Triplets:<Charles M. Schulz
2:
--------------------
Text: Charlie Brown's All Stars!:  It was the second such TV special (following "A Charlie Brown Christmas") to be produced by Lee Mendelson and Bill Melendez (who also directed), and originally aired on CBS on June 8, 1966.
Triplets:<Charlie Brown's All Stars

ere are the extracted triplets:

--------------------
Text: Scott Derrickson (born July 16, 1966) is an American director, screenwriter and producer.
Triplets:<Scott Derrickson
3:
Text: Charlie Brown's All Stars!:  It ceased to be aired annually by 1971, and was last shown on CBS on April 3, 1982 (although Disney Channel and Nickelodeon aired reruns of the special in the 1990s).
Triplets:<Charlie Brown's All Stars
4:
--------------------
Text: Charlie Brown's All Stars!:  ABC returned the special to television on April 7, 2009, as a companion to "It's the Easter Beagle, Charlie Brown".
Triplets:<Charlie Brown's All Stars!
